Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Hm? Oh! Hi! I didn't expect to see anyone out here. ... You're looking for me, are you? Heh... Well I guess I've been taking my time after all and got a bit distracted. Sorry about that! It's nice to meet you! I'm $Actor_7$, Wandmaker by trade.]
[Name:1][Text:I hear you're an artisan right? That sounds so much more interesting than what I do. Do you enjoy it?][Default]
[Name:2][Text:Hey, $Name$. You ever have one of those days where you just feel like you can't do anything right? Yeah. Hope your day is going better at least.][Default]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you?][Name:ShopOpen]
[Name:Gift][Text:What? I haven't done anything to deserve this. Thank you.]
[Name:Collection][Text:This is!? No. how did you get this? I don't... I can't... Really? Thank you so much!]

[Name:Raining|1][Text:My mother used to tell me stories of monsters that came out when it was raining. I know she just made them up but, sometimes, I can't help but wonder, you know?][Weather:Raining]

[Name:Task_1_Start][Text:Wait, before we go could I get you to lend me a hand? I was looking for some $Item_227$. It's a type of plant with some minor magical properties and very useful for making rods. If you could look for a few for me, that'd be very helpful.]

[Name:Task_1_End][Text:You found some? Marvelous! This will keep me stocked for a few days at least.
Town was this way you said? I'll see you there!]

[Name:Task_16_Start][Text:Not what I'd call a town, but it's a lovely start. Could I bother you to build a little something for me? I need to place to work and relax you understand.][UnlockObjectID:22]
